description:
The group travels to meet the spring-eating dragon. In the process, they learn more about the forest and the fairy country.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die burschikose Fee und der Frühling fressende Drache - Teil 2
La fée garçonne et le dragon dévoreur de printemps (partie 2)
Otenba Yousei to Haru o Taberu Ryuu (Kouhen)
The Tomboy Fairy and the Spring-Eating Dragon (Part 2)
おてんば妖精と春を食べる竜(後編)
